title: Inline Inspection (PIG) Tool Tracking
description: A control room operator is tracking the real-time progress of a PIG as it travels through a natural gas pipeline.

tasks.description: Monitor the PIG's location using its onboard transmitter and sensors placed along the pipeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: System displays the PIG's current location and speed on a map.

tasks.description: The system detects that the PIG has stopped moving, indicating it may be stuck.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates an alert that the PIG is no longer progressing.

tasks.description: Dispatch a field crew to the PIG's last known location to investigate and retrieve the tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a work order for the field crew.
